text.content:
Clocked!

Triple damage. The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Bludgeoning

Head Shot

Triple damage. Crit Effect: The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude] or die.

Piercing

From chops to Groin

Triple damage. Crit Effect: The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude] or die.

Slashing

Doomed!

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 round, and is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 1}.

Bomb or Spell
